description: Configuration for code snippet parser and quality filters

notes.maxNodeLength: Maximum character count for a single snippet (default: 800)
notes.minNodeLength: Minimum character count to avoid trivial snippets (default: 100)
notes.maxNumLines: Maximum number of lines in a snippet (default: 25)
notes.maxLineLength: Maximum characters per line to avoid horizontal scrolling (default: 100)
notes.removeComments: Strip comments from snippets during import (default: true)
notes.enableCommentSkipping: Future: Make comments visible but not typable (default: false)
